text: Shanuis a Bangladeshi film actress. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Performance in a Negative Role for the film Bou Shashurir Juddho (2003) ==Selected films== * Shikari - 2001 * Juari - 2002 * Bou Shashurir Juddho - 2003 * Vondo Neta - 2004 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font- size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" !
